whatnow.delete_content_translation: Ibi bizakuraho ubutumwa bwatoranijwe kububiko bwububiko bwububiko buva mururimi rwubu
whatnow.no_languages: Hitamo cyangwa ukore ururimi kugirango utangire

whatnow.add_language_attribution: Kora intanga kugirango wongere ururimi rushya

edit_whatnow.title: Umutwe
edit_whatnow.content_url_description: URL kubindi bisobanuro bijyanye nubu butumwa bwumutekano.
edit_whatnow.mitigation_help: Igihe kirekire cyigihe kugirango ugabanye ingaruka
edit_whatnow.mitigation_extra: Kugabanya ni amagambo maremare yo guhanura ibintu byangiza.
edit_whatnow.seasonalForecast_extra: Ibihe byigihe ni inyandiko yo guhanura ibintu byangiza.
edit_whatnow.watch_extra: Isaha itangwa mugihe ibyago byo guhura nikibazo cyiyongereye cyane, ariko ibintu byabayeho, ahantu, cyangwa / cyangwa igihe ntikizi neza.
edit_whatnow.warning_extra: Ibirori byangiza bifite amahirwe menshi yo kubaho mu masaha ~ 24-48.
edit_whatnow.immediate_key_message_tooltip: Iki nikikorwa cyibanze umuntu agomba gufata kugirango agire umutekano.
edit_whatnow.recover_extra: Fata ibi bikorwa nyuma yibyabaye kugirango habeho umutekano.
edit_whatnow.download_image_error: Ikosa ryo gukuramo ishusho, nyamuneka reba neza ko wasohoye impinduka zose hanyuma ugerageze.
edit_whatnow.download_instructions: Kanda iburyo hanyuma uhitemo 'Kubika Ishusho nka ...' kugirango ubike
edit_whatnow.disaster_risk_reduction_description: Ubutumwa bwumutekano bufite ubumenyi bwa rubanda nuburere rusange kuri DRR (pape)
edit_whatnow.recovery_extra: Fata ibi bikorwa nyuma yibyabaye byangiza umutekano
edit_whatnow.anticipated_extra: Hariho ibyago byo gutegerejwe mbere muminsi 3-5.
edit_whatnow.prepare_to_respond_extra: Gutezimbere ubushobozi bwo gusubiza ubuhanga bwo kwiga no kubika ingingo
edit_whatnow.assess_and_plan_extra: Suzuma ibyago nibikorwa bya gahunda kugirango umenye, bigabanye, kandi usubize ibyabaye
edit_whatnow.mitigate_risks_extra: Fata ingamba zo kugabanya ingaruka zo gukora ibidukikije byubatswe kandi bisanzwe biteka kandi ushyireho sisitemu yo kuburira hakiri kare
edit_whatnow.url_tool: Ihuza amakuru menshi yumutekano kuri societe yigihugu cyangwa urubuga rwabafatanyabikorwa
edit_whatnow.desc_tool: Tanga ibisobanuro bigufi kubyerekeye ingaruka nubutumwa.
edit_whatnow.safety_tool: Iki nikikorwa cyibanze umuntu agomba gufata kugirango agire umutekano.
edit_whatnow.supporting_tool: Ibi biratanga ibisobanuro birambuye kugirango dushyigikire ibikorwa byingenzi byingenzi.

register_form.subtitle_1: Fasha abaturage kwitegura no gusubiza ingaruka zaho zifite umusaraba utukura umutuku crescent ubutumwa bwumutekano bukorwa.
register_form.subtitle_2: Niba ushaka kugera kuri API, wiyandikishe kandi ugabane ubutumwa hamwe nubuyobozi 3.
register_form.subtitle_3: Niba uri umusaraba wumutuku societe yigihugu yumutungo wa Crescent Crescent, wiyandikishe kandi uzahabwa amabwiriza yuburyo bwo guhuza no gusangira ubutumwa bwumutekano.
register_form.national_society_description: Tangaza ubutumwa bwigihugu cya RCRC bwa societe yigihugu yigihugu, igihugu, nibitsina kugirango agere kuri radiyo.

industries.non_profit: Kudaharanira inyungu / imiryango itegamiye kuri leta

register_form.api_used_in_help: Reka noneho uko uteganya gukoresha iyi serivisi mugihe kitarenze inyuguti 255
register_form.welcome: Murakaza neza {izina}, nyamuneka wuzuze amakuru akurikira kugirango utangire:
register_form.ifrc_note: Kubibazo cyangwa andi makuru, nyamuneka hamagara:

applicable_law.body: Amategeko y'akarere ka Columbiya azagenga uburenganzira n'iri tegeko, nta gutanga ingaruka ku mahame ayo ari yo yose y'amakimbirane.
applicable_law.heading: Amategeko akurikizwa:

terms_service_page.body: Ushinzwe kubungabunga ibanga n'umutekano w'urufunguzo rwo kwiyandikisha zitambutse kuri wewe.
terms_service_page.contact: Nyamuneka saba umusaraba utukura kuri {0} nibibazo byose bijyanye na API.
terms_service_page.disclaimer: Ibiciro bya API na Data bitangwa kubikorwa byamakuru nuburezi gusa, no kuri 'nkuko bimeze' kandi 'nkuko bihari'.

entire_agreement.body: Amasezerano ya API igizwe namasezerano yuzuye kandi yihariye hagati yumusaraba utukura kandi wubaha kuriyi ngingo kandi asimburwa numwonda ubanza cyangwa amatangazo, itumanaho, cyangwa amasezerano aho burimo bwasojwe hano hano.
entire_agreement.heading: Amasezerano yose:

terms_service_page.heading: API iherezo ryumukoresha
terms_service_page.intro: Emera: Ukoresheje serivisi cyangwa kugenzura agasanduku katanzwe, umukoresha yemeye guhambira aya masezerano.

license_limitations.body: Urashobora gukoresha amakuru yamakuru gusa yifatanije na porogaramu yawe bwite ukurikije amategeko ya API, kandi ugakomeza gukomeza guhuza na API, nkuko bivugururwa buri gihe.
license_limitations.heading: Uruhushya n'imbogamizi:

privacy_policy.body: Urabyumva, wemera ko ibikorwa bya gahunda zimwe, serivisi, ibikoresho, uburyo bwo kugura, ibikoresho muri API bisaba gutanga, gukoresha no gukwirakwiza amakuru atandukanye yo kumenya.
privacy_policy.heading: Politiki y'ibanga:

prohibited_activities.body: Wowe n'abakoresha amaherezo cyangwa abakozi bawe ntibakoresha API cyangwa amakuru yamakuru muburyo bukurikira:
prohibited_activities.heading: Ibikorwa bibujijwe n'imyitwarire:

prohibited_list.one: Kubangamira cyangwa guhungabanya serivisi zitukura cyangwa seriveri.
prohibited_list.two: Gutsindisha cyangwa guhindura imfunguzo zose cyangwa umutekano wigenga byakozwe numusaraba utukura cyangwa API, harimo nta mbaraga ikoranabuhanga.
prohibited_list.three: Gusaba, gukusanya, gusaba cyangwa kutabona uburyo bwo kwinjira mu mazina, ijambo ryibanga cyangwa izindi nyandiko zemeza ku musaraba utukura uretse icyatanzwe kuri konte yawe.
prohibited_list.four: Kuri leta cyangwa kwemeza ko kwifata, gutera inkunga cyangwa kwemeza kwa Croix-Rouge cyangwa undi musaraba utukura cyangwa societe yumutuku cyangwa umuryango wigihugu.
prohibited_list.five: Kuvuga cyangwa kuvuga ko utunze cyangwa washyizeho ibiryo bya API, imenyesha ryamakuru, cyangwa / cyangwa witegure, gusubiza, no kugarura ubutumwa.
prohibited_list.six: Guhereza virusi iyo ari yo yose, ishyano, amafarashi ya Trojan, cyangwa ibintu byose bya kamere isenya.

terms_service_page.reserve_rights: Croix-Rouge ikurikirana uburenganzira bwo guhindura no / cyangwa ntagiha API namakuru agaburira muri rusange cyangwa igice, haba mugihe gito cyangwa burundu, igihe icyo aricyo cyose utabanje kubimenyeshwa.

severability.body: Ubushake bwigihe cyose cyangwa gutanga amasezerano ya API ntibizahindura agaciro k'indi ngingo.
severability.heading: Imirongo no Kureka:

suspension.body: Umusaraba utukura ugenzura uburenganzira bwo guhagarika cyangwa guhagarika kwinjira niba Croix-Rouge igena, ko ukoresha ibiryo bitemewe na API cyangwa kugaburira umutekano wa API cyangwa / cyangwa umutekano w'umuntu uwo ari we wese cyangwa imiyoboro y'umuntu utukura.
suspension.heading: Guhagarikwa cyangwa guhagarika:

user_agreement.title: Amasezerano y'abakoresha
user_agreement.para_one: Mbere yo kubona ubutumwa bwumutekano patabase partal, nyamuneka urashobora gusoma kandi wemera ingingo z'amasezerano y'abakoresha ukuramo inyandiko hepfo hanyuma ukande 'buto' Nemera 'hepfo.

create.icon_requirements: Ibishushanyo bigomba kuba png no munsi ya 30kb
create.requestLink: Menyesha IFRC gusaba ubwoko bushya bwa hazard
create.error: Ihangane, habaye ikibazo cyo gukora ubwoko bwawe bushya bwa hazard.

subnationals.select_soc: Hitamo societe kugirango urebe kandi wongere imbaraga

form.name: Izina ryubucuruzi
form.name_help: Vuga ubuyobozi ushaka gukora ubutumwa bwumutekano wabigenewe.

subnationals.delete: Ibi bizasiba subutation nibirimo byose bifitanye isano niyi nkuru.
